page.title: 05Vicar of Dinnington's Day
page.content: On Thursday 6th June{Revd.Tim Spence rose early to have no interruptions while praying. The morning was spent taking a service at St. Cuthbert's Church, Brunswick, visiting parishioners, writing letters and making phone calls. After lunch he spent an hour in church with children from Dinnington School, then another clergyman visited him to discuss a wedding they were holding together, he then prepared the Marriage Register.At teatime he had a call to visit a dying man, he stayed to comfort the family and then went to the Sacred Heart Roman Catholic Church to discuss a Healing Service with Father Cass. At 6.30pm he took a Confirmation Class at Dinnington then returned to the dying man who had just died. He made other calls returned to his home,worked in his study and went to bed at midnight.
